segments.text: Over there, on the other side of the kitchen, I see the children.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy is quite determined to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's balanced on a stool, reaching into the "COOKIE JAR."
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is standing by, eagerly waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They've opened the cabinet doors wide for this heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a classic secret mission, isn't it?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way her hand is outstretched is quite endearing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are completely engrossed in their little scheme.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost taste those forbidden cookies myself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a mischievous pair they are.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's clear they don't want the adult to know.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They certainly know how to collaborate for a sweet reward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they enjoy their spoils.
segments.speaker: PAR
